titles.title: To amend section 552(h) of title 5, United States Code, to require agencies provide records to the Director of the Office of Government Information Services.
Office of Government Information Services Empowerment Act of 2018
Office of Government Information Services Empowerment Act of 2018
Office of Government Information Services Empowerment Act of 2018

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform.
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.

calendar.text: Ordered to be Reported by Voice Vote.
